title: Diamond Toplane sucht Team Dia 3 aufwärts (S 4 oder S 5 )
body:
Whatup guys, as in the Title mentioned i am looking for a decend and SERIOUS Team for the Future,
since i got decend experience with Teams and the Game itself, i am a Team oriented player
Important Informations:
Age: 19
Main Role: Solo TOP
Main Champ: Rumble
Current Elo S5: Diamond V (not happy with that, but will change later or sooner anyways)
Team Experience in Master and Challenger Niveau [x]
IGN:Eyderiän
Name: Adrian

I got a great Championpool (from Aatrox to Zed anything is possble), and ofc i am willed to learn new strats and Champs just for the Team.

What i am looking for:

I want a Team or an Organisation who is really interested in High Elo Gameplay, Tournaments, Coaching, Practising!

I dont want a fun Team and if possible i would prefer an experienced Team who just got rid of their Toplaner and need to find another one ( don´t want someone to got kicked but yeah would be great if you played together for a while allready)

I am aiming on Challenger 5v5 at least this Season and a solid Team for Tournaments etc (w/e the future will bring tho)

If you need a Toplaner with High Elo experience, just add me ingame : Eyderiän

Diamond 3+ S 4 if possible

gl hf cya ingame :)

Adrian Eyderiän S.


PS: Erstmal sry, dass alles in Englisch geschrieben ist, aber wollte echt nicht den ganzen scheiß nochmal neu schreibn , denke Englisch sollte eh jeder beherrschen.
